TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompilationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class CompilationSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the compilation infrastructure of Web applications.

span.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the compilation infrastructure of Web applications.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改的內容`compilation`組態檔區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `compilation` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的數個屬性的值`compilation`區段，也可以做為成員的存取類別。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `compilation` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定值`compilation`> 一節。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `compilation` section. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的成員類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以取得的執行個體類別使用方法。You can obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

span.span: Gets the of the .

value.span: A ，其中包含 ASP.NET 資源編譯期間使用的組件物件。

span.span: A that contains the assembly objects used during compilation of an ASP.NET resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含在編譯動態 ASP.NET 資源時使用的組件參考。This property contains the assembly references to use during compilation of a dynamic ASP.NET resource. 編譯每個程式碼模組時，ASP.NET 會將這些組件自動連結的資源。ASP.NET automatically links these assemblies to the resource when compiling each code module.

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying a post-process compilation step for an assembly.

value.span: 字串值，指定組件編譯後置處理步驟。

span.span: A string value specifying the post-process compilation step for an assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Batch { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Batch : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether batch compilation is attempted.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether batch compilation is attempted.

value.span: 如果嘗試批次編譯;否則， 。

span.span: if batch compilation is attempted; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設為`true`變更存取編譯的檔案時，需要編譯所造成的延遲。Set this attribute to `true` to change the delay caused by the required compilation when you access an uncompiled file. 將此屬性設定為`true`指示批次模式中的所有未編譯的檔案的先行編譯的 ASP.NET。Setting this attribute to `true` instructs ASP.NET to precompile all the uncompiled files in batch mode. 檔案會先編譯; 時，就會發生延遲不過一旦這些檔案會進行編譯，延遲也會刪除。A delay occurs when the files are first compiled; however once the files are compiled, the delay is eliminated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/CS/CompilationSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CompilationSection/VB/CompilationSection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan BatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.BatchTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation.

span.span: Gets or sets the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation.

value.span: 值，表示以秒為單位的批次編譯授與發生的時間量。

span.span: A value indicating the amount of time in seconds granted for batch compilation to occur.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示逾時期間 （秒），批次編譯。Indicates the time-out period, in seconds, for batch compilation. 如果編譯無法在逾時期限內完成，編譯器將回復到目前網頁的單一編譯模式。If the compilation cannot be completed within the time-out period, the compiler reverts to single-compilation mode for the current page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Gets or sets the default programming language to use in dynamic-compilation files.

span.span: Gets or sets the default programming language to use in dynamic-compilation files.

value.span: 值，指定的預設程式設計語言，在動態編譯檔案中使用。

span.span: A value specifying the default programming language to use in dynamic-compilation files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的預設程式設計語言，例如 C# 或 VB.NET，若要使用動態編譯檔案中。Specifies the default programming language, such as C# or VB.NET, to use in dynamic compilation files. 語言名稱會定義使用`system.codedom`> 一節。Language names are defined using the `system.codedom` section. 預設程式設計語言是`vb`，VB.NET 指定為預設的程式設計語言。The default programming language is `vb`, which specifies VB.NET as the default programming language. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an ASP.NET application can take advantage of [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch functionality.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an ASP.NET application can take advantage of [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch functionality.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 應用程式可以利用 [！INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] 預先擷取功能。否則， 。

span.span: if an ASP.NET application can take advantage of [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch functionality; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預先擷取是一個公用程式，為了改善應用程式啟動效能之前它會要求應用程式資料載入記憶體。Prefetch is a utility that is intended to improve application startup performance by loading application data into memory before it is demanded . > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]預先擷取服務必須設定並執行這項設定才能生效。The [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)] prefetch service must be configured and running for this setting to be effective.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the Microsoft Visual Basic compile option.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the Microsoft Visual Basic compile option.

value.span: 如果 Visual Basic編譯選項已啟用，否則。

span.span: if the Visual Basic compile option is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 指定 Visual Basic編譯選項已停用。

span.span: specifies that the Visual Basic compile option is disabled.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性指定的 Microsoft Visual Basic 中的設定`explicit`編譯選項。This property specifies the setting of the Microsoft Visual Basic `explicit` compile option. 當設定為`true`，Visual Basic`explicit`編譯選項。When set to `true`, the Visual Basic `explicit` compile option is enabled. 啟用此選項時，所有的變數必須明確宣告使用`Dim`， `Private`， `Public`，或`ReDim`陳述式。When the option is enabled, all variables must be explicitly declared using a `Dim`, `Private`, `Public`, or `ReDim` statement. 預設值為 `true`。The default is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定每一批次編譯所產生的來源檔案的最大大小 （以 kb 為單位）。Specifies the maximum size (in kilobytes) of the generated source files per batched compilation. 預設值是 1000 KB。The default value is 1000 KB. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Gets or sets the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 值，指出動態編譯的應用程式重新啟動之前可發生的資源數目。

span.span: A value indicating the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts.

value.span: 預設為 15 重新編譯。

span.span: The default is 15 recompilations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示動態編譯的應用程式重新啟動之前可發生的資源數目。Indicates the number of dynamic recompiles of resources that can occur before the application restarts. 在全域和應用程式的組態層級，但目錄組態層級不支援這個屬性。This attribute is supported at the global and application configuration levels, but not at the directory configuration level. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 會增加屬性值，每次組件會失效，且無法刪除。ASP.NET increases the property value every time an assembly is invalidated and fails to be deleted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為，ASP.NET 編譯系統啟用要加速 ASP.NET 犧牲增加 CPU 使用量的啟動效能最佳化。When this property is set to , the ASP.NET compilation system enables optimizations that are intended to speed up ASP.NET startup performance at the expense of increased CPU utilization. 這個屬性的預設設定。The default setting for this property is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the Visual Basic compile option.

value.span: 如果 Visual Basic編譯選項是用，否則。

span.span: if the Visual Basic compile option is used; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`true`，編譯明確不允許資料就會發生遺失，任何資料類型轉換和數字類型與字串之間的任何轉換。When `true`, compilation explicitly disallows any data-type conversions in which data loss would occur, and any conversion between numeric types and strings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: Gets or sets the version of the .NET Framework that the Web site targets.

span.span: Gets or sets the version of the .NET Framework that the Web site targets.

value.span: 預設值是 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需特定的.NET framework 版本為目標，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案的.NET Framework 多目標](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76)。For information about how to target a specific version of the .NET Framework, see [.NET Framework Multi-Targeting for ASP.NET Web Projects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76). ## Examples [compilation 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）compilation Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性會指定為`true`在組態中，將會使用 Url 編譯器指令，而非實體路徑。If this property is specified as `true` in the configuration, URLs will be used for the compiler instructions instead of physical paths. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
